metadata.name: Shitting Trump - 2018
metadata.description: Made with found studio objects and materials, Shitting Trump is a nod to the widespread and consistent failures of global political leadership and its failures to recognize its critical position in motivating and supporting its peoples. Shitting Trump was composed at a time when parallels in political instability and horseplay between the USA and South Africa were at a high. By 2018, Donald Trump was well into his U.S presidency and drawing headlines for every other statement or tweet made on topics from the States' foreign policies and gender politics. South Africa's Jacob Zuma had resigned under the dark cloud of racketeering, fraud, and corruption charges threatening to reemerge.
